headline: VARIAN ION/DUAL THERMOCOUPLE GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Ion/Dual TC Gauge Controller    Varian Model 845
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model 845
Description Ion/Dual TC Gauge Controller
Gauge Types Controlled Ion; Thermocouple
Cables Included No
Other Information

Operates UHV, broad band and standard tubes
LED Display Two independant thermocouple circuts/ analog readout
Filament selector switch for UHV tubes
Two process control set points
Range: 9.9 x 10-2 to 0.1 x 10 -11 Torr

Condition Good
Power Requirements 120/240 V 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 22 lb (10 kg)
